level.heading: NONPROFIT CORPORATIONS[COLON] AMENDING RESTATED ARTICLES OF INCORPORATION (§7-741)

level.text: 741.1 A nonprofit corporation shall not use the restated articles of incorporation to amend:

A nonprofit corporation restating its articles of incorporation may identify the filing as a “restated articles of incorporation” or “restated and amended articles of incorporation” instead of an articles of amendment as stated in D.C. Official Code § 29-408.07(c) (2011 Repl.).
